title: (slight) deadline extension
body:
For those of you pinched for time getting entry submissions
together for tonights deadline, I offer a small reprieve: you have
until late Thursday night (technically into the wee hours on
Friday). I'm getting on a plane Friday morning and plan to do the
judging on the road. So if your entry ends up in the
FlyingDukes@sun.com inbox before I go, you'll be in luck.
